participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and easy-going, enjoys a laid-back lifestyle.
participant_1.background: I work part time. My favorite animal is the koala. I live with a roommate. I do not like beer.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, loves to share stories and experiences.
participant_2.background: I vacation in florida every winter. My sister is a published author. I sing karaoke every thursday night. My favorite color is yellow. I was a champion downhill skier in college.
